title: Psychic Vengeance
content:
Psychic Vengeance Effect When the wielder has 50% Hit Points or less, they deal an additional 1d4 Psychic damage. Equipment Githyanki Greatsword Githyanki Longsword Githyanki Crossbow Githyanki Shortsword

Psychic Vengeance

When the wielder has 50% Hit Points or less, they deal an additional 1d4 Psychic damage.

Githyanki Greatsword Githyanki Longsword Githyanki Crossbow Githyanki Shortsword

Psychic Vengeance is an Equipment Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Equipment Features provide passive effect
